item.title: About Me
item.description: All opinons here are my own, not my employer or any other organization cited here. Career I started with a 2 year stint at HP as a software developer, got laid off, and have worked at Red Hat, Inc. ever since. It’s been good; I’m not actively looking for a new job. IBM acquired us a few years ago and continues to behave like an ally too, which is encouraging.
